result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Richard James Whitney

defendant.name: Whitney, Richard James
defendant.address: 6655 County Road G, Egg Harbor, WI 54209

records.addlTxt: Court removes Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: GPS Monitoring.  All other conditions remain in effect as previously set.

1:32 PM Defendant Richard James Whitney appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Shannon Viel appeared by video for Richard James Whitney.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Court addresses bond modification request.  Defense requests Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: GPS Monitoring be removed. Atty Viel makes a statement.  State has no objection. Court grants request, amends bond.
Bail/bond hearing on October 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on January 9, 2023 at 11:00 am.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.

9:15 AM Defendant Richard James Whitney in court, in custody.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Richard James Whitney.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover. Atty Viel requests a hearing for bond modification, requests Pretrial release monitoring  GPS be removed.  Bond remains in effect.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 11:00 am.

1:07 PM Defendant Richard James Whitney appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Shannon Viel appeared by video for Richard James Whitney.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court addresses request to modify bond. State requests cash bond be amended, makes statement.  Defense makes statement. Court denies request, bond remains as previously set.
Motion to Modify Bond with attachments
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 09:10 am.

10:52 AM Defendant Richard James Whitney in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Richard James Whitney.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reschedules.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Status conference on September 7, 2022 at 10:50 am.

1:40 PM Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Richard James Whitney appeared by phone from Sauk County Jail.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Richard James Whitney. Court questions where matter is at. Atty Viel requests case get scheduled with other cases. State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 10:50 am.
State's Discovery Demand

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. GPS Monitoring. Not to be within 2 miles of victims residence. No contact direct or indirect with K.A.B, her residence or place of employment.

1:03 PM Defendant Richard James Whitney appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Shannon Viel appeared by video for Richard Whitney. Court addresses defenses request for bond modification.  Defense requests cash bond be lowered or be lowered significantly and GPS monitoring be added. Victim makes statement. State is apposed, makes statement.  Court grants request, lowers cash bond, adds GPS monitoring.
Bail/bond hearing on July 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Defendant fingerprinted on 6/29/22.
Zoom Instructions for Victim

10:25 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Richard James Whitney appeared by video from the Door County Jail.   Atty Shannon Viel appeared for Richard Whitney. Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Defense waives time limits for prelim.  Court finds waiver being made freely, voluntarily and intelligently. Defense requests bond modification. Court unable to hear request, victim not notified of request. Bond remains in effect.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Subpoena Witness Data Sheet
No contact direct or indirect with K.A.B, her residence or place of employment.

1:00 PM Richard Whitney appeared by video from the Door County Jail. Nicholas Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Shannon Viel appeared by video for Richard Whitney.  State gives incident report, potential charges. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history, reviews right to Counsel. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Return
